events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position at our company. Our team is excited to review your qualifications and experience.
Your application has been categorized under the Software Engineering team. We will now proceed with the next phase of our recruitment process.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will be your point of contact throughout the hiring process. Expect further communication soon.
Your profile has passed the initial screening by our recruitment team. We are impressed with your background and would like to invite you for a technical interview.
Thank you for your invitation to the technical interview. I am available on the proposed dates and look forward to discussing my fit for the software engineer role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM UTC. Please ensure you have a stable internet connection and the necessary software installed.
You have completed the technical interview successfully. Our team will review your performance and get back to you with the next steps shortly.
Based on your technical interview results, we have scheduled an HR interview for May 15th at 11 AM UTC. This interview will cover company culture and benefits.
You have successfully completed the HR interview. We appreciate your time and answers, and we are moving forward with your application.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position, including salary, benefits, and other terms. Please review the details and let us know your decision.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer. We are delighted to hear that the terms meet your expectations and are here to assist with any further questions.
We have received your acceptance of the offer for the Software Engineer role. Welcome aboard! We are excited to have you join our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially started. You will receive all necessary access credentials, training schedules, and team introductions this week.
The hiring process for this Software Engineer position is now closed as you have successfully joined our company. We look forward to your contributions.
